name: Fatal Paws (itch)
description:
A visual novel with dark humor, turn based combat, and stat building. Experience the fatal strength in companionship and the emotional bond that can come from it.

You can expect to laugh and be surprised.

Dark Humor

Tactical Turn Based Combat

Challenge - Two difficulty levels so that you can have a casual or strategic playthrough.

Mystery - Discover the truth about your cat.

Trust Building

Beautiful Art and Story

2 Unlockable Gallery Images

A Lot of Blood

Your cat comes with 5 different abilities to slay foes with.



Quotes From Play Testers:

"Game is funny, over the top, and fantastical. Wouldn't mind a sequel."

"The humor was amazing, I was cracking up laughing throughout the entire thing. I had no idea what to expect but going through it I was not disappointed."

"I really liked the combat style, it was cute and tactical at the same time."
